body: Hello, I am Divide_23 and I am new to the Avicus Network. I usually play on the Overcast Network, but I currently have a 7-day ban. I decided to try Avicus out. Most people from OCN hate this server but I don't know why. It seems like a great place. I hope to have a great time on this server.
body_tagged: Hello, I am Divide_23 and I am new to the Avicus Network. I usually play on the Overcast Network, but I currently have a 7-day ban. I decided to try Avicus out. Most people from OCN hate this server but I don't know why. It seems like a great place. I hope to have a great time on this server.
title: Hi, I'm Divide_23

replies.body: Welcome to the community and the forums. I hope you enjoy the time you spend here.
replies.body_tagged: Welcome to the community and the forums. I hope you enjoy the time you spend here.

replies.body: Well welcome to the server! Glad you took a chance on an amazing server!

replies.body: Hey there! :D Welcome to the Avicus Community! (You'll love it here ;) If you have any questions, feel free to contact any of the Staff Members, as we will help you! ;) As for that, welcome! ^-^

Enjoy your time!
We don't have anything against OCN.

replies.body: Welcome! I really don't understand the hatred at all tbh. Anyway you will find everyone here warm and welcoming! :)

replies.body: I don't know if this would be to much to ask, but could you tell me some things that would help me out around here. I kind of get the basics of this server, but I'm not really sure about it.

Feel free to contact me if you have any questions. I'd be more than happy to respond.
